title: How do i transfer my account back from RU SERVER?
body:
I acidentally transfered my acc to RU. Because it costed only 1rp, and now i cant get it back because i cant use paypal in RU.
What can i do to transfer it back to EUNE??? Ive been trying to do it for one or two years now but i cant do anything. Help pls.

replies.body: No worries, our account team should be able to look into this with you directly and find some options.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll work with you there!
